plot: A young mother, alone with her daughter, confides in a friend who happens to be the director herself. Chantal Akerman, although she sympathizes with the mother, does not say a word.
title: L'enfant aimé ou je joue à être une femme mariée
plot_es: A young mother, alone with her daughter, confides in a friend who happens to be the director herself. Chantal Akerman, although she sympathizes with the mother, does not say a word.
original_name: L'enfant aimé ou je joue à être une femme mariée
